abstract: Talks between Yahoo and Microsoft have heated up, raising anew the possibility that a search partnership between them could be near.
snippet: Talks between Yahoo and Microsoft have heated up, raising anew the possibility that a search partnership between them could be near.
lead_paragraph: For months, Yahoo and Microsoft have held on and off discussions about how to pool their search efforts together to create a more powerful counterweight to Google. The Times reported that the talks were continuing as recently as Tuesday.

headline.main: Yahoo and Microsoft Said to Be Closer to Search Deal
